EmailTemplate.description: Send email to PSR when Old Quote Lease Doc is terminated
EmailTemplate.name: Template for PSR when Old Quote is terminated
EmailTemplate.subject: Terminated Lease {!Quote_Summary__c.Lease_Number__c}, New Lease {!Quote_Summary__c.New_Quote_Lease_Number__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Quote_Summary__c.Primary_PSR__c},
{!Quote_Summary__c.Dealer_Account__c} has successfully terminated Lease {!Quote_Summary__c.Lease_Number__c} and has executed Lease {!Quote_Summary__c.New_Quote_Lease_Number__c}.
Please terminate the order for Lease {!Quote_Summary__c.Lease_Number__c}.
Please process new order for Lease {!Quote_Summary__c.New_Quote_Lease_Number__c}.
Regards Lease Team
